rose from his seat in the great assembly
and prostrated with his five limbs at the Buddha's two feet.
He addressed the Buddha, saying:
I have a mantra, a mudrÄ, and three emissary mantras for the vast accomplishment of the Dharma.
I wish to benefit and bring peace and happiness to the good men and good women of JambudvÄ«pa.
I only pray that the World-Honored One will compassionately grant permission for me to now explain them.
The mantra states:

Namo ratna trayÄya, namo Ärya-avalokiteÅ›Äya, tadyathÄ: Å›reyas Å›reyas saá¹ƒpreá¹£aá¹‡i, bhavati jÄva jÄtÄ, karÄla karÄla maraá¹‡a maraá¹‡a, sarva karma-dravyaá¹‡i me bhavantu svÄhÄ. Having recited this mantra, evil karma is eliminated.
Recite up to seven times, the five heinous crimes will be extinguished.
If one completes a thousand recitations, there is no sin that will not be extinguished.
If one completes one hundred thousand recitations, one will directly see AvalokiteÅ›vara adorned with various adornments.
During the first seven days of practice,
One may only eat milk porridge and ghee.
On the last day, do not eat.
On the night of the fifteenth day, recite in front of the Buddha without a fixed number of times.
When the image emits light and proclaims,
Excellent, excellent!
And places pearls and precious objects on top of the mantra master's head,
One will then know that it is a verified vision.
Having directly seen AvalokiteÅ›vara,
One will fulfill all good wishes.
If one dreams of AvalokiteÅ›vara adorned with various adornments while sleeping,
All good things will be accomplished.
All evil karma will be extinguished.
The one who truly turns and turns will attain the elimination of sins.
Next, I will explain a mudrÄ also called benefiting sentient beings.
With this one mudrÄ, thirty-two and various accomplishments are achieved.
Interlock the backs of the two hands.
Press the two thumbs on the two index fingers to form a sword.
Use the mudra to face the sky to form a celestial canopy.
The realm of the ten directions of the heavens is formed by binding in each place.
Facing the deity is for universal offerings.
Performing the method is for universal veneration.
Later, it is for dedication.
Moreover, for saving and dismissing, if one wishes to subdue evil people,
make the hand seal without duality, and recite with an angry mind one hundred and eight times.
All non-Buddhists' creations will be destroyed. If a person has a heart ailment, empower yellow earth and apply it to the heart to remove it.
If a person has a headache,
earth and fire.
If a person has eye problems,
empower apricot seed oil and apply it to remove it.
If a person has a swelling,
empower it one hundred and eight times and apply it to remove it.
If a person wishes to drive away demonic affairs,
empower wood eight times and the person will be driven away.
Next, the messengers, the three teachers, and the twenty-eight divisions are the general leaders.
The left palm is flat, facing upwards.
With the thumb moving back and forth.
The messengers in the heavens.

If a person completes the mantra practice,
They will ride through the sky and become a celestial immortal.
Summoning celestial dragons, yakshas, ghosts, and spirits,
They can send them away as they wish, with even greater magical power.

The Accomplishment Method of the Thousand Transformations of the One Seal of Akatamasha, with Three Messengers, in One Scroll. The Essential Ritual of the Bodhisattva Deep Sands General, in One Scroll. Yunlu says:
The Method of Mahesvara, in One Scroll. Ruilu says:
The Method of the Born-from-Transformation Mantra of Mahesvara Heaven, in One Scroll. No person's name.
Three pages.
The Discourse on the Dharma of Love, the Dharma of Subduing Enemies, the Dharma of Illness, and the Discussion of Pure and Impure.
